trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand> event when a button within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> row field is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand>事件內按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>按下資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Insert", "Page", or "Update").
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項也其他特製化時引發事件會按一下某些按鈕 (按鈕`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 刪除 」、 「 插入 」、 「 頁面 」 或 「 更新 」)。

trans-unit.source: When using one of these buttons, you should consider using one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>).
trans-unit.target: 當使用其中一個按鈕時，您應該考慮使用其中一個控制項所提供的特定事件 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: If the button that raised the event has a command name or command argument value, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs> object to determine these values.
trans-unit.target: 如果引發事件的按鈕命令名稱或命令引數的值，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>物件來判斷這些值。

trans-unit.source: To determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷命令名稱並按之按鈕的命令引數，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>屬性，分別。

trans-unit.source: You can also access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control that raised the event by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>引發事件所使用的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs> class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs> 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> 建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs> object passed to the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand> event to determine the command name of the button clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand>使用者所按的事件，以判斷按鈕的命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the single-file coding model.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用單一檔案的程式撰寫模型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a code-behind coding model version of the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示先前範例的程式碼後置程式碼撰寫模型版本。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work, you must copy the code below into the associated code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 要讓範例能夠運作，您必須將下列程式碼複製到相關聯的程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the code-behind file for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示先前範例的程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: 命令的來源。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" />，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Initial value
trans-unit.target: Initial value

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>中包含`originalArgs`參數。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>中所含物件`originalArgs`參數。

trans-unit.source: The object contained in the `commandSource` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的物件`commandSource`參數。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件時主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: 取得命令的來源。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> class that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 類別的執行個體，表示命令來源。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property to access the properties of the object that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>屬性來存取表示命令的來源物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, this will be the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control itself, and in other cases it will be the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，這會是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制本身，並在其他情況下會很<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>已按下的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property to determine which of two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controls raised the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>屬性來判斷這兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control has handled the event.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否已處理事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if data-bound event code was skipped or has finished running; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已略過或已完成執行資料繫結事件程式碼，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` in the event handler to specify that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control should not handle the event because you are handling it in your code.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性設定為`true`的事件處理常式，以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項不應該處理事件，因為程式碼中處理它。
